text: Pen mam ay sɨkop, yad nɨbop kɨles gɨl agnɨŋɨd anɨb agebin, nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Bɨ ogɨnap takaw okok nɨb dad apɨl agñɨl, takaw tep ned nepek ak tɨbɨlɨkɨpal. Anɨgel, binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal ogɨnap nɨŋɨd, apyap pakɨl takaw tep ak kelɨgɨl, asɨk keke lɨpal. Anɨb ak nɨbop abe gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup ak, kɨlop kud ñɨl pal okok yenɨmɨb.
